channel.title: [PI] Teleports
channel.description: My server has a skill teleport but i also want other teleports such as agility, hunter, and dungeoneering to be there as an option too.

item.title: [PI] Teleports
item.dc:creator: @bestofpvm bestofpvm
item.description:
@bestofpvm wrote:

uhhhhhhhhhh what? explain more in-depth PLOX?

item.title: [PI] Teleports
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“bestofpvm, post:3, topic:438986”]*/case 51013:
case 6004:
case 117162:
c.getDH().sendOption5(“Agility”, “Hunter”, “Skill Area”, “Dungeoneering”, “Alternate Agility”);
//c.teleAction = 21;
break;
it doesn’t let me teleport where i want to?[/quote]

You have to make a dialogueAction and link these 5 options and their resulting outcomes with cases 9190-9194.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Teleports
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

When you click the skill teleport find out what button Id that is.

Go to your clickingbuttons class and search that button Id.

Send a dialogue like this:

c.getDH().sendOption#("", "");

Then implement the other teleports depending on how many options you added within your clickingbuttons class in their respective cases.

Read full topic
